fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Public Health
head_office_address: Secretariat CED-IADR at KU Leuven Mrs. Rosa Ciloglu Kapucijnenvoer 7, Block A - box 7001
eu_initiatives:
CED-IADR is a purely scientific organization with the goal to promote high-quality oral health research in Europe. 
CED-IADR would like to influence in future: 
 
- research & technology 
- Public health policy, in particular oral health policy and including education, prevention and training; 
- Nutrition and food policy 
- Chronic diseases prevention
organisation_name: Continental European Division of the International Association for Dental Research (CED-IADR)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Continental European Division of the International Association for Dental Research (CED-IADR), headquartered in Leuven, Belgium, is a nonprofit organization with more than 1,100 members. CED-IADR's missions is to promote high-quality oral health research in Europe by:  
 
  
1.advancing research and increasing knowledge to improve oral health  
2.supporting and representing the oral health research community in Continental Europe 
3.facilitating the communication and application of research findings. 
 
  
 
The Continental European Division (CED-IADR) encompasses dental research in the following countries: 
 
Albania, Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bosnia Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, the Czech Republic, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macedonia, Moldova, Montenegro, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, , Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Switzerland, Turkey and Ukraine.
relevant_communication:
NONE. CED-IADR is a purely scientific organization with the goal to promote high-quality oral health research in Europe.  
 
We are organizing every second year a scientific congress including scientific symposia, scientific awards, etc.
